mapper.select: select tbl_order.mno,ono,tbl_order.p_no,tbl_order.pno,delAddr,receiverName,receiverPhone,message,count,productPrice,shipFee, totalPrice,orderDate,orderStatus,name,phoneNum,p_name,payName,payContent from tbl_order left outer join tbl_memberInfo on tbl_order.mno = tbl_memberInfo.mno left outer join tbl_product on tbl_order.p_no = tbl_product.p_no left outer join tbl_paymentInfo on tbl_order.pno = tbl_paymentInfo.pno where tbl_order.mno=#{mno} order by tbl_order.orderDate desc;

select tbl_order.mno,ono,tbl_order.p_no,tbl_order.pno,delAddr,receiverName,receiverPhone,message,count,productPrice,shipFee, totalPrice,orderDate,orderStatus,name,phoneNum,p_name,payName,payContent from tbl_order left outer join tbl_memberInfo on tbl_order.mno = tbl_memberInfo.mno left outer join tbl_product on tbl_order.p_no = tbl_product.p_no left outer join tbl_paymentInfo on tbl_order.pno = tbl_paymentInfo.pno where tbl_order.ono=#{ono}
